text: Francis Bacon (28 October 1909 â€“ 28 April 1992) was an Irish-born British painter. He was famous for his disturbing paintings of crucifixions, popes, self-portraits, and portraits of close friends. He was one of the most recognized British painters of the 20th century. title: Francis Bacon (artist)
